summary: A documentary which explores the connections among sound, rhythm, time, and the body by following percussionist Evelyn Glennie, who is nearly deaf.
cast: Evelyn Glennie|Fred Frith|Roxane Butterfly|Horacio 'Negro' Hernández|Ondekoza|This Misa Saikou|Jason the Fogmaster|Roger Glennie
title: Touch the Sound: A Sound Journey with Evelyn Glennie
